column5: I am making a pontoon system for a canoe and was wondering where I can buy for a good price, rectangular/square tubing (steel or aluminum) and cotter pins/fasteners to allow for telescoping arms within the main tubing support. I also need to find out where I can pick up some good pontoons as well...........any ideas? Thanks
second metal supermarkets...seem to have anything i need whenever i go there

METAL SUPER MARKET is wayyyyy to over priced..  give these guys a call..  Maintenance Metals and Alloys Inc The Metal Depot  18 Killaloe Road Unit 1 Concord.  905-738-4038  We use them on a weekly basis, they have a great selection and pricing.  I hope this is not considered spam LOL!  G

Was just in Princess Auto (Mississauga) and saw a fairly extensive selection of Aluminum tubing on the back wall. Never noticed this before and made a note to go back and check it out when I have more time. Looking to build me a carp rod pod.
Yeah seems as though i have a "LargeMouth"  G
